name: VSCode
desc: Microsoft Visual Studio Code lets you build and debug modern web and cloud applications. Move IDE extension will help you cope with environment requirements for Visual Studio Code.

name: IntelliJ IDEA
desc: IntelliJ IDEA is undoubtedly the top-choice IDE for software developers. There is a feature-rich IDE plugin for the Move language, which is integrated natively with Aptos CLI tooling.

name: Move Playground
desc: Move Web IDE

name: Typescript SDK
desc: Aptos provides a fully supported TypeScript SDK with the source code in the Aptos-core GitHub repository.

name: Python SDK
desc: Aptos provides a lightly maintained official Python SDK. It is available on PyPi with the source code in the Aptos-core GitHub repository.

name: Rust SDK
desc: Aptos provides an official Rust SDK in the Aptos-core GitHub repository.

name: Aptos Framework
desc: The Aptos Framework defines the standard actions that can be performed on-chain both by the Aptos VM

name: Aptos Wallet Adapter
desc: A monorepo modular wallet adapter

name: MSafe
desc: MSafe wallet is the first multi-sig, non-custodial digital assets management solution built on Move

name: Pyth
desc: Pyth is designed to bring real-world data on-chain on a sub-second timescale.

name: Switchboard
desc: Permissionless, Multichain Oracle Network

name: SupraOracles
desc: Oracle solution for enterprise

name: NodeReal
desc: The ultimate and fastest Web3 infrastructure solution on BNB Chain, ETH, Polygon and Aptos

name: Ankr
desc: Your Instant RPC Gateway to Aptos

name: Blast API by Bware Labs
desc: Web3 Infrastructure for Everyone

name: BlockEden.xyz
desc: BlockEden.xyz is a suite of APIs powering dApps of all sizes for Aptos and Sui blockchains. Build dApp and scale faster.

name: BlockPI Network
desc: Distributed Web3 Infrastructure

name: Chainbase
desc: Welcome to chainbase docs, the powerful Web3 developer platform.

name: Chainstack
desc: Run high-performing Aptos RPC nodes and APIs in minutes on a platform built for scale.

name: Moralis
desc: Moralis provides APIs, SDKs and Data for building high performance dApps. Integrate Web3 into any tech stack

name: Koizumi
desc: The Best Aggregator for Aptos NFT Collectors

name: Livepeer
desc: Livepeer is a decentralized video infrastructure network.

name: Mokshya Protocol
desc: Building open source smart contracts and SDKs for Aptos

name: indexer
desc: The Multichain Indexing Platform

name: MoonPay
desc: A fast and simple way to buy and sell crypto

name: Aptos Name Service
desc: Secure your .apt domain for your journey through the Aptos ecosystem.

name: BlueMove
desc: Explore the most outstanding NTFs in all topics of life. Buy NFTs (or sell 'em) to earn rewards.

name: Souffl3
desc: Aptos NFT marketplace

name: Topaz
desc: Topaz is an NFT marketplace built on the powerful Aptos blockchain, with a focus on safety and scalability.

name: Axelar
desc: Axelar delivers secure cross-chain communication for Web3. Our infrastructure enables dApp users to interact with any asset or application, on any chain, with one click.

name: Celer
desc: Celer is a blockchain interoperability protocol enabling a one-click user experience accessing tokens, DeFi, GameFi, NFTs, governance, and more across multiple chains.

name: LayerZero
desc: LayerZero enables messages to be sent between blockchains.

name: Multichain
desc: Multichain, as a cross-chain router protocol (CRP), endeavors to be the ultimate router for Web3.

name: Wormhole
desc: Wormhole is a decentralized generic interoperability protocol for multiple blockchain ecosystems.

name: AptStats
desc: A comprehensive dashboard helps you to have a better understanding in Aptos, includes chain, DeFi and ecosystem projects, etc.
